cast.name: 约书亚·布伦南 Joshua Brennan
马库斯·格雷厄姆 Marcus Graham

introduction: Martin Parker finds himself in a police interrogation room, his torn tux smeared with cake, blood and someone else's spew. He's just been accused of a serious crime he swears he didn't commit. He better have a good story... Sixteen hours earlier Marty was at the wedding reception of the girl of his dreams. Despite the misguided attempts of his numnut mate, Marty admits defeat and resigns to drink his unrequited love away. But after a surprise encounter with a celebrity mentor, Marty decides that true love is worth fighting for and hatches a hare brained scheme to win her back - using the power of dance.
